conbody.p: The initial NCC CNF is deployed into a customer's Kubernetes environment with the Istio service mesh configured by the customer. Before the installation of NCC CNF, the following must be done and prepared:

ul.li: Istio service mesh is set up.NCC CNF supports 1.4 and 1.5 Istio versions.
